block.p: Dr. Valerie Tom, a daughter of Shuet Chun Tom and Fu Kueng Tom of Livingston, N.J., was married yesterday to Dr. Warren B. Hrung, the son of Yang-Chih Hrung and Dr. Paul Hrung, both of Midwest City, Okla. The Rev. John Graf Jr., a nondenominational minister, performed the ceremony in St. Paul's Chapel at Columbia University in New York.

Dr. Tom, 29, is keeping her name. In June, she completed a residency in pediatrics at Babies and Children's Hospital in New York. She graduated cum laude from Wellesley College and received her medical degree from the University of Medicine and Dentistry of New Jersey in Newark. Her parents own Success Fashions, a manufacturer of women's clothing in New York.

Dr. Valerie Tom, a daughter of Shuet Chun Tom and Fu Kueng Tom of Livingston, N.J., was married yesterday to Dr. Warren B. Hrung, the son of Yang-Chih Hrung and Dr. Paul Hrung, both of Midwest City, Okla. The Rev. John Graf Jr., a nondenominational minister, performed the ceremony in St. Paul's Chapel at Columbia University in New York.

Dr. Tom, 29, is keeping her name. In June, she completed a residency in pediatrics at Babies and Children's Hospital in New York. She graduated cum laude from Wellesley College and received her medical degree from the University of Medicine and Dentistry of New Jersey in Newark. Her parents own Success Fashions, a manufacturer of women's clothing in New York.

Dr. Hrung, 27, is an economist at the Treasury Department in Washington. He graduated cum laude from Harvard and received a Ph.D. in economics from the University of California at Berkeley. His parents are chemists with the Defense Department and work at Tinker Air Force Base near Oklahoma City.
